title: Add animated moving platforms (vertical + circular)
description: Introduce placeholder moving platforms that the player can jump on. Define two movement patterns: vertical oscillators and circular/orbital movers. Mechanics: platforms are solid tiles; player should land on them, ride them as they move, and lose support when leaving. For vertical movers: amplitude 2-4 tiles, period 2-4s, reverse at endpoints; for circular movers: radius ~2-3 tiles with constant angular velocity, clockwise by default. Add basic collision handling so the player inherits platform motion when standing on top (apply platform delta to player when onGround and overlapping). Add a small set of test platforms in Level 1 to validate.
